subject: Attention: Christine
body:
Credit Agricole Next Bank Sa

Esplanade de Pont-Rouge 8-1

71212 GRAND-LANCY

Suisse-Switzerland

Phone, 05 331 23 45

E-mail: mailto:info@agricolenext.com



Attention: Christine



Dear  Sir/Madam



We do confirm  your funds $5.5M domicile request from forwarding institution from Rev. James Morrison and we are currently working on having your personal offshore dollar account set up and funds made domicile upon completion of the account opening process and all other required formalities.



Do provide us with the following biometrics information to enable us get your offshore account set up , ensure to have the information correctly given and returned to us with the following supporting document(s) ;



1). Valid Identification



2). Passport photograph (jpeg format)



..............................................................................



(1) First Name:..........................



(2) Middie Name:.....................



(3) Last Name:.......................



Date Of Birth:........................................



Your ID CARD or Passport Copy.........................................

Residential Address/City/State/Country/Zip code:........................................



Nationality:........................................



Marital Status:........................................



Phone Number:........................................



Email:........................................



Occupation:.........................................



Amount:.............................................

Any Other Additional Information:



I/We ______________________________ hereby attest that all information given above is correct to the best of my knowledge. And as applicable to the opening of the offshore account I accept any liability or consequence in wrong information supplied by me. I declared in this AFFIDAVIT that all information’s supplied above are correct to the best of my knowledge.



Note that you are to respond to this facsimile within three banking days and that only the parties who have completed the respective forms authorized to communicate with us.

Do get back to us at your earliest to enable us finalize your account opening process in time .



Warm Regards,



Mrs. Christine Gandon

(Director Foreign Remittance)

This transmission may contain information that is privileged, confidential and exempt from disclosure under applicable law. If you are not the intended recipient, you are hereby notified that any disclosure, copying, distribution, or use of the information contained herein (including any reliance thereon) is STRICTLY PROHIBITED, if you received this transmission in error, please immediately contact the sender and destroy the material in its entirety,whether is electronic or hard copy format.

subject: Re: Attention: Christine
body:
Hello Mrs. Christine Gandon,

Thank you for your email and the information provided. I'm excited about the prospect of setting up an offshore account with Credit Agricole Next Bank Sa.

However, before we proceed, I have a few questions that I hope you could help me understand better. 

1. Could you please explain more about the benefits of having an offshore dollar account? 
2. What are the charges associated with maintaining such an account?
3. How secure is my money in this offshore account?
4. Are there any legal implications that I should be aware of?

I look forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Christine

subject: Re: Attention: Christine
body:
Credit Agricole Next Bank Sa

Esplanade de Pont-Rouge 8-1

71212 GRAND-LANCY

Suisse-Switzerland

Phone, 05 331 23 45

E-mail: mailto:info@agricolenext.com



Attention: Christine



Dear  Sir/Madam

We acknowledge your mail to us, requesting to know this below items before you proceed further.




1. Our requirements in disbursing all the accrued accredited compensation fund from international Governing bodies is through On line wire transfer.

We  expected to be involved and participate in the process of receiving your funds yourself and directly.



2. The main and major benefit of using On line method is for security reasons. We want to be sure the rightful owners  the fund is meant for are those that gets it themselves.

We try as much as getting them involved in the transfer process (being among the team that will instruct the bank to effect your transfer by your instructions)

3. No charges incurred in operating such accounts. It just enables you to be able to transfer your funds your self into your bank account which only knows like providing your pin number into your Atm card before an Authorizations to release cash is made. We call it Direct Mandate.

4. No legal implications of having such an off shore Account for easier transaction to the world, that's what is meant should you be privilege of traveling Abroad. Too many Advantages but what you are interested about is to help you effect your transfer into your nominated account in your base and country by yourself.

We do hope you are cleared enough.



Warm Regards,



Mrs. Christine Gandon

(Director Foreign Remittance)

This
 transmission may contain information that is privileged, confidential 
and exempt from disclosure under applicable law. If you are not the 
intended recipient, you are hereby notified that any disclosure, 
copying, distribution, or use of the information contained herein 
(including any reliance thereon) is STRICTLY PROHIBITED, if you received
 this transmission in error, please immediately contact the sender and 
destroy the material in its entirety,whether is electronic or hard copy 
format.

subject: Re: Attention: Christine
body:
Hello Mrs. Christine Gandon,

Thank you for your detailed explanation about the online wire transfer process. It's great to know that security is a top priority and I appreciate the effort to involve me directly in the process.

I'm curious about this Direct Mandate you mentioned. Could you please elaborate more on how it works? Also, could you explain a bit more about the benefits of having an offshore account?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Christine
